attributionColor.comment: The text color for the source attribution line expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
backgroundColor.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
headerText.comment: The text to use in the header area
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
interval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
lineColor.comment: The color of the line dividing the subheader from user records expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
logDetailsEnabled.comment: Indicates whether the debug info should be printed out
redisPort.comment: The port the redis server is running on.
redisServer.comment: The hostname of the redis server.
textColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
userDetailsEnabled.comment: Indicates whether user details should be output to the image (create date, hub fees, txs)
userDetailsTextColor.comment: The color of the account detail text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
userAccounts.comment: Definitions user info associated with account id

userAccounts._config_summary.comment: A brief description of this item for nodeyez-config app
userAccounts.accountid.comment: The account id assigned in the database
userAccounts.name.comment: The alias given to the account
userAccounts.name: Samantha Sample
